name: Armbar
description: A joint lock submission on the opponent's arm.

description: A chokehold using the legs to form a triangle.

description: A joint lock submission targeting the shoulder.

description: A chokehold from the opponent's back.

name: Omoplata
description: A shoulder lock submission from the guard position.

name: Ankle Pick
description: A takedown technique targeting the opponent's ankle.

name: Bow and Arrow Choke
description: A chokehold using the opponent's lapel and legs.

name: Kesa Gatame
description: A control position used in judo and jiu-jitsu.

name: Arm Drag
description: A technique to unbalance and control the opponent.

name: Loop Choke
description: A chokehold using the opponent's lapel.

description: A guard position used in jiu-jitsu for sweeps and attacks.

description: A triangle choke from the mounted position.

name: Americana Lock

name: Double Leg Takedown
description: A powerful takedown technique to lift and drive the opponent to the ground.

description: A guard position used for control and sweeps.

name: Bow and Arrow Sweep
description: A sweep technique from the guard position.

description: A chokehold using the arms and neck.

description: A guard position for sweeps and control.

name: Berimbolo
description: A dynamic guard sweeping technique.

name: Monoplata

name: Twister

description: A playful guard position for sweeps and escapes.
